description:
T.C. Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı Bilgi İşlem Dairesi Başkanlığı tarafından hazırlanan Resmi Mobil Uygulamadır. 

Türkiye’de örgün Eğitimde bulunan tüm çocukların velilerinin kullandığı sistemdir. Veliler Sınav ve Proje Bilgileri, Not Bilgileri, Ders Programı, Devamsızlık Bilgileri, Nakil İşlemleri, Yerleştirme ve Sınav Bilgileri, Okul duyuruları, Okuduğu kitaplar gibi bilgileri sistem sayesinde anlık olarak takip edebilmektedir.

Learn a new language with the world’s most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by language experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math and Music the Duolingo way!  

Build real-world math skills – from calculating tips to identifying patterns – and sharpen your mental math in our Math course.

Learn how to read music and play familiar songs on your device in our Music course – no instrument required.

Whether you’re learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you’ll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?
• Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters keep you motivated to build solid skills across language, math and music.

• Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

• Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

• Join 300+ million learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

• Every course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian. And now, learn Math and Music with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo:

“Far and away the best language-learning app.” –The Wall Street Journal

“This free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I’ve tried… lessons come in the form of brief challenges – speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions – that keep me coming back for more.” –The New York Times

“Duolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.” – TIME Magazine

“…Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun…” - Forbes

“Our favorite language app…” - CNET

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

If you choose to purchase Super Duolingo, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://www.duolingo.com/terms

description:
2023 eğitim vizyonu hedefleri ve çağın gereksinimleri doğrultusunda yenilenen Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı'nın dijital eğitim platformu EBA; www.eba.gov.tr adresinde sunulan, sınıf seviyelerine uygun, güvenilir ve incelemeden geçmiş doğru e-içerikleri bulabileceğiniz sosyal bir platformdur. 
Mobil cihazınız ile EBA uygulamasını yükleyerek platformdaki etkileşimli içeriklere ek olarak  video, ses, görsel, doküman, kitap ve dergi içeriklerine ulaşabilir ve farklı bir uygulamaya ihtiyaç duymadan canlı derslerinizi gerçekleştirebilirsiniz.

Ehliyet Sınav Soruları ile çıkmış ehliyet sınav sorularını çözerek sınava hazırlanın. e-sınav (elektronik sınav) uyumludur.
Ehliyet sınavına CENK HOCA ile hazırlan.
En son çıkmış ehliyet sınav soruları
En yeni en güncel çıkmış ehliyet sınav soruları
Animasyonlu E-Sınav (videolu) soruları
Ehliyet Araç Göstergeleri ve trafik işaret levhaları
Sınırsız sınav oluşturabilirsiniz
50 sorudan oluşan ehliyet denemeleri
Açıklamalı soru çözümleri

Ehliyet cenk hoca uygulaması
E-Sınav MEB Ehliyet sınav soruları ile tam uyumludur.
Elektronik ehliyet sınavı soruları çöz

- Çıkmış Ehliyet Sınav Soruları ile hazırlık yapabilirsiniz. Elektronik sınav (e-sınav) için etkili bir çalışma aracı!
- MEB Çıkmış Sorular tamamı ehliyet sınavında çıkmış sorulardan oluşan sınavlar.
- Binlerce soru ile hazırlık yapabilirsiniz. Elektronik sınav (e-sınav) için etkili bir çalışma aracı!
- Çıkmış sorular ve detaylı çözümlerle, geçmiş yılların (2018-günümüze) sorularını çözerek sınavı daha iyi anlayabilirsiniz.
- Animasyonlu sorular ve video destekli konu anlatımlarıyla öğrenmek daha eğlenceli! 
- Extra bilgi notları ve şık açıklamaları ile her sorunun kritik noktalarını kavrayabilirsiniz.

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
_____________
*** YASAL UYARI (SORUMLULUK REDDİ) ***
Bu uygulama ("Ehliyet Sınav Soruları CenkHca") herhangi bir devlet kurumunu temsil etmez ve herhangi bir resmi devlet kurumuyla bağlantılı değildir veya onlar tarafından yetkilendirilmemiştir. Uygulamada yer alan ehliyet sınavı soruları, konu anlatımları ve diğer bilgiler, ehliyet çıkmış sorular [https://www.meb.gov.tr/meb_sinavindex.php?B=2] adresinden alınan kamuya açık verilerden derlenmiştir.

Information About Driver's License Exams

Exam Questions and Updates
- Driver's license exam questions are updated and published every evening.
- Questions from electronic exams conducted during the day are added to the app on the same day.
- You can find all the exam questions from the past month in our app.

App Features
- Driver's License Exam Questions from the Past Month (2025)
- Previous E-Exam Questions (2025)
- Driver's License Exam Questions (2025)
- Lesson Notes
- Leaderboard
- Chat Room
- Traffic Signs
- Vehicle Indicators

Frequently Asked Questions About E-Exams

What is the Driver's License E-Exam?
- It is an exam conducted on a computer at centers designated by the Ministry of National Education.
- The exam is conducted electronically without using printed materials.

When is the Electronic Exam Held?
- Appointments must be made for e-exams.
- In case of failure, a new exam appointment can be made at least 15 days later.
- If a candidate does not attend the electronic exam within 45 days after their last exam, they lose one attempt.

What to Do If We Fail the Exam?
- Candidates who fail the e-exam can book a new appointment after waiting for 15 days.

When Are the Exam Results Announced?
- The results are announced immediately after completing the exam.

How is the E-Exam Conducted?
- The exam is conducted on a computer using special software that allows navigation between questions and marking answers.

What is the Cost of the E-Exam?
- The electronic exam fee is 120 TRY.
- Fees can be paid via Ziraat Bank, Halkbank, or Vakıfbank.

What Are the Requirements for Taking the Electronic Exam?
- Completion of the theoretical training provided by the driving school is required.
- After completing the training, candidates can take the electronic exam at designated centers.

Exam Duration and Question Distribution
- The exam consists of 50 questions:
  - 12 First Aid
  - 23 Traffic
  - 9 Engine
  - 6 Traffic Etiquette
- The exam duration is 45 minutes.

What Is the Passing Score?
- A minimum score of 70 is required to pass the exam, which means answering at least 35 questions correctly.

When Is the Practical Driving Test Held?
- The practical driving test is scheduled at least two weeks after passing the electronic exam, but the duration may vary depending on circumstances.

This application is dedicated to my late daughter Markiz, my beloved wife Esra, and my dear son Poyraz.

developer: Milli Egitim Bakanligi Ortaogretim Genel Mudurlugu
description: Millî Eğitim Bakanlığınca geliştirilen bireysel öğrenme platformu MEBİ, YKS’ye ve okul derslerine yönelik hazırlanmış olup, sınava hazırlık sürecinde size destek sağlayacak ve okul derslerinizi pekiştirmenizde, konuları daha kalıcı hale getirmenize yarayacak hazırbulunuşluk testi, konu anlatım videosu, konu anlatım özeti, örnek sorular, çıkmış sorular ve kendinizi ölçmenizi sağlayacak değerlendirme testlerinden oluşmaktadır. MEBİ’de yer alan çalışma planım, raporlarım, deneme/tarama/yazılı, rehberlik modülleri ile kendi gelişim sürecinizi grafikler yardımı ile görebilir, analiz edebilirsiniz ve eğitim sürecinizi yeniden yapay zeka desteği ile şekillendirebilirsiniz.

ehliyetCepte: Your Ultimate Companion for Driver's License Exam Preparation

ehliyetCepte is a comprehensive education app that guides you through your driver's license exam preparation journey. As the most popular and highly-rated app in the education category, ehliyetCepte provides everything you need to succeed in your driver's license exams.

* Extensive Question Bank: With over 4000 past exam questions and detailed explanations, ehliyetCepte offers thorough preparation that covers every aspect of the exam.

* Video-Assisted Questions: Explore video-supported questions tailored to the new driver's license system, enhancing your understanding and offering a visual learning experience.

* Topic Summaries: Dive into 20 topic-specific summaries that help you grasp key concepts more efficiently and make the most of your study time.

* Practice Tests: Assess your understanding of each topic with targeted 10-question tests, enabling you to track your progress and focus on weak areas.

* Experience Sharing: Gain insights from experienced individuals who have taken the exam before, benefiting from their tips, hints, and practical strategies.

* Apple Watch Compatibility: Introducing our new Apple Watch app, allowing you to continue learning topics from your wrist. Select your favorite subjects to optimize your study routine.

* Pass Guarantee and PRO Exclusive Questions: For PRO users, we offer a pass guarantee. If you don't pass the exam, we'll refund your money. Gain access to exclusive PRO questions for enhanced preparation.

* Success Statistics: Remember, 96% of our users pass the exam on their first attempt. This impressive success rate demonstrates ehliyetCepte's reliability as an effective exam preparation tool.

ehliyetCepte is your reliable guide to confidently tackle your driver's license exams. Its user-friendly interface, extensive content, and interactive learning tools empower you with everything you need to excel.

Take the first step towards success by downloading ehliyetCepte now!

developer: GAMESTER EGITIM BILISIM VE YAZILIM TEKNOLOJILERI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
AWARD-WINNING LEARNING APP FOR TODDLERS & PRESCHOOLERS (AGES 2–6)

2,000+ Educational Games, Videos, Books & Activities | Kid-SAFE & COPPA Certified | Mom’s Choice Gold Award Winner

Welcome to Tiny Minies – the most complete early learning app for your child’s daily routine.

Join 5 million+ families around the world and discover a magical space where learning, fun and family bonding come together. From energetic play to calming bedtime stories, Tiny Minies supports your child throughout the day with meaningful, expert-backed content every step of the way.

Tiny Minies helps kids grow smarter, more creative and more confident, while having tons of fun! 

LEARN THROUGH PLAY. GROW WITH CONFIDENCE.

Designed by educators and psychologists, Tiny Minies transforms screen time into purposeful, balanced experiences anytime and anywhere. Use it for a quick 10-minute play session, during classroom routines or while traveling. Our content supports a healthy balance of screen and screen-free learning.

Explore 2,000+ activities designed to support every area of early development:
- Letters & Words – Early literacy, vocabulary, phonics
- Early Math Skills – Numbers, patterns, problem-solving
- Creativity & Imagination – Art, storytelling, roleplay
- Think & Solve – Puzzles, matching, logical thinking
- Friends & Feelings – Empathy, emotional intelligence
- Physical Skills – Fine motor & movement games
- Music & Rhythm – Piano play, sing-alongs, dance songs
- Memory Boosters – Focus, attention, cognitive skills
- Life Skills – Real-world scenarios like cooking, shopping & caregiving
- Calm & Mindfulness – Yoga, breathing, bedtime meditations
- Around the World – Cultural stories & global adventures

FAMILY MOMENTS MADE SPECIAL
Tiny Minies encourages shared screen time; where parents and children connect, laugh and learn together. Whether you’re reading a storybook, doing yoga side-by-side or playing pretend, it’s about bonding through technology in healthy, meaningful ways.

FOR PARENTS: DESIGNED WITH YOU IN MIND
- Track progress for up to 5 kids
- Smart screen time limits and progress reports
- Personalized tips to support development
- Safe, ad-free space with kid-friendly navigation
- Multi-device access and full offline mode

ONE APP. EVERYTHING THEY NEED.

Tiny Minies is your all-in-one solution for the early years, supporting learning, play, family time and even sleep. It’s more than just an app; it’s a thoughtful, expert-designed solution for your child’s entire day.

Start your 7-day FREE trial today – no payment required!

If you need help or just want to say ‘hi’, get in touch at kids@gamester.com.tr 

Follow us: Instagram @tinyminies.en & Youtube Channel: tinyminies

Read our full privacy policy here: kids.gamester.com.tr/privacy-policy

Ready to Speak English Confidently? 

Welcome to Learna AI English Tutor App, your all-in-one solution for mastering the English language! Learn English with grammar, speaking, reading, pronunciation, and vocabulary practices designed to enhance your proficiency in every aspect of the language.

With Learna AI, you can speak English confidently and effectively through interactive conversations. Our app takes your language learning journey beyond traditional methods. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Learna AI is here to help you learn & speak English in a fun, engaging, and personalized way.

English practices and lessons are guided by our Learna AI Virtual Chat Character, offering tailored support as you learn. You can speak with the AI character to improve both your speaking and listening skills. The app provides real-time feedback, helping you speak correctly and refine your vocabulary as you go. This makes learning English more dynamic, interactive, and efficient, as you can practice speaking at your own pace.

Learna AI also focuses on improving your grammar skills. You’ll learn essential grammar rules and practice them through a variety of exercises that help reinforce your understanding. The grammar practices are designed to gradually improve your proficiency, allowing you to speak with accuracy and clarity. As you learn grammar, you will build a stronger foundation for your speaking and writing skills.

Vocabulary plays a critical role in speaking English fluently. With Learna AI, you can improve your vocabulary by learning new words and phrases that are practical and useful in daily conversations. Each lesson focuses on building your vocabulary, ensuring you have a broad range of words at your disposal. The app features vocabulary practice that adapts to your level, helping you speak more naturally and confidently.

Your pronunciation also gets a boost with Learna AI. As you speak, you’ll receive valuable feedback to improve your pronunciation. The app includes exercises specifically designed to help you master English pronunciation and speak clearly. Pronunciation practices allow you to correct mistakes and sound more authentic when speaking English.

Track your progress with detailed performance metrics and milestones. Set learning goals to monitor your achievements and celebrate your successes. With continuous practice, you’ll see your speaking skills improve, and your vocabulary will expand. By setting specific goals, you ensure that each practice session is focused and effective.

Learna AI Language Tutor Features:

English Conversation Practice with Learna AI Virtual Chat Character
Get feedback from Learna AI for your mistakes
Learn English Grammar with tailored lessons
Improve your English Reading Skills
Enrich your English Vocabulary with daily vocabulary practices & Learn new words 
Spelling Check and vocabulary reinforcement
Perfect your English Pronunciation through interactive exercises
Enhance your English Speaking Skills through practical speaking practice
Track your progress and set goals to continually improve
Speak, practice, and learn today with Learna AI, your partner in mastering the English language!

Play engaging quiz-based games (kahoots) at school, at home and at work, create your own kahoots and learn something new! Kahoot! brings the magic of learning for students, teachers, office superheroes, trivia fans and lifelong learners.
 
Here’s what you can do with the Kahoot! app, now available in English, Spanish (LATAM), French, German, Italian, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Ukrainian and Korean:
 
Students
- Study with unlimited free flashcards and other smart study modes
- Join kahoots hosted live - in class or virtually - and use the app to submit answers
- Complete self-paced kahoots
- Study at home or on the go with flashcards and other study modes
- Compete with friends in study groups
- Challenge your friends with kahoots you found or created
- Create your own kahoots and add images or videos
- Host kahoots live for family and friends directly from your mobile device
 
 
Families and friends
- Find a kahoot on any topic, fit for any age
- Host a kahoot live by sharing your screen to Apple TV or via video conferencing apps
- Play a live kahoot using SharePlay. Start a FaceTime call and select the kahoot you want to play. No host is required - everyone can participate!
- Engage your kids with studying at home
- Assign a kahoot to challenge family members and friends
- Create your own kahoots and add different question types and image effects
 
Teachers
- Search among millions of ready-to-play kahoots on any topic
- Create or edit your own kahoots in minutes
- Combine different question types to increase engagement
- Host kahoots live in class or virtually for distance learning
- Assign student-paced kahoots for content review
- Assess learning outcomes with reports
 
Company employees
- Create kahoots for e-learning, presentations, events and other occasions
- Encourage audience participation with polls and word cloud questions
- Host Kahoot! live in person or in a virtual meeting
- Assign self-paced kahoots, for example, for e-learning
- Assess progress and results with reports
 
Premium features:
Kahoot! is free for teachers and their students, and it’s our commitment to keep it that way as part of our mission to make learning awesome. We offer optional upgrades that unlock advanced features, such as an image library with millions of images and advanced question types, such as puzzles, polls, open-ended questions and slides. To take advantage of these features, users will need a paid subscription.
 
To create and host kahoots in a work context, as well as get access to additional features, business users will need a paid subscription.
 
Recurring billing, cancel anytime
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the cost of the renewal will be provided.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user. Auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
 
Privacy Policy: https://kahoot.com/privacy

Ehliyet sınavları artık online olarak yapılmaktadır ve ehliyet sınavlarının yeni adı Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavı olmuştur. Bu Ehliyet sınavları e-sınav merkezlerindeki bilgisayarlar üzerinden gerçekleştirilmektedir. Elektronik Sınavların uygulaması bilgisayar başında gerçekleştirilirken E – sınav sisteminin getirdiği kolaylıklar sayesinde mevcut sorular seçenek işaretleme yöntemi ile cevaplanır. Sonraki sorulara devam etme veya önceki sorulara geri gelme fırsatı da sunan bu online sistemin sağladığı en önemli avantaj sınav sonuçlarını sınavın bitimiyle birlikte öğrenebiliyor olmanız. Ehliyet Sınav Soruları 2025 ile bu bilgilere ulaşmak artık çok kolay!

• Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavı Başvuru Şartları Nelerdir?

Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavına girmek için bazı kriterler vardır, bunlar:

- Ehliyet almak isteyen kişiler A, A1, A2, B, B1, C, C1, F ve M sertifika türünden teorik olan eğitimlerini tamamlamalı,
- Teorik eğitimi tamamlayan kişilerin ehliyet türüne göre istenilen yaş sınırını tamamlamış olmalı,
- Adaylar E – sınav ücretini yatırmış olmalı,
- Adaylar E – sınav için sınav randevusu almış olmalı,
- Son girilen Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavı üzerinden 15 gün geçmiş olmalı,
- Ehliyet Sınavı hakkı bitmiş adaylar tekrar E – Sınav başvurusu yapmak için MTSK’ya kayıt yaptırmalı,
Her ayın 1’i ve 10’u arasında yeni yapılacak Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavı için yukarıdaki şartları sağlayan sürücü adayları 2 hafta içerisinde ehliyet sınavına girebilir. 2025 Ehliyet Sınav Soruları uygulamasını indirin ve çalışmaya başlayın!

• E – Sınav Ehliyet Soruları 2025 müfredatı nedir?

Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavı, Milli eğitim bakanlığı tarafından hazırlanır ve şu konu başlıkları altında toplanır:

- Trafik Adabı
- Trafik ve Çevre Bilgisi
- Motor Bilgisi
- Araç Tekniği
- İlk Yardım Bilgisi
- Trafik İşaretleri ve Anlamları

• Elektronik Ehliyet Sınav süresi kaç dakika?

Teorik ehliyet sınavı 45 dakika sürmektedir, sürücü kursu bu süreyi size belirtir. Sürücü adaylarından cevaplanması beklenen ehliyet sınav soruları 50 adettir, ehliyet alabilmek için sorulardan 35 tanesi doğru cevaplanmalıdır. Aksi takdirde Ehliyet sınavında başarısız olunur. Ehliyet Sınav soruları 2025 ile bu durumun önüne geçebilirsiniz!

Elektronik Ehliyet Sınavında 3-4 yanlış 1 doğruyu götürmez, bu yüzden sınavda boş soru bırakılmamalıdır.

• Çıkmış Elektronik Ehliyet Sınav Soruları nerede bulunur?

Ehliyet Sınavı çok uzun yıllardır yapılmaktadır, Ehliyet türü fark etmeksizin yeterli bilgiye sahip olunduğu teorik ehliyet sınavında kanıtlanmalıdır. Yeni ehliyet alacak kişiler sadece teorik dersleri değil, çıkmış ehliyet sınavı soruları ile de hazırlanmalıdır. Peki geçmiş yıllara ait ehliyet sınav soruları nerede bulunur dediğinizi duyar gibiyiz. Cevap Ehliyet Sınav Soruları 2025 uygulamasıdır! Uygulamamız ile Ehliyet Yazılı Sınavı, Sürücü Kursu, Sürücü Belgesi, Ehliyet Soruları, Trafik İşaretleri ve Direksiyon Sınavı hakkında merak ettiğiniz her türlü bilgiye ulaşabilir, kendinizi sınava en uygun şekilde hazır hale getirebilirsiniz.

__________________________________________

Hi, and welcome to Toca Boca World! It’s the ultimate universe for kids to play, design, and explore their endless imaginations. This isn't just a game, it's a safe space where every story is yours to create, and the fun never stops.

Toca Boca World is where creativity takes centre stage:
• Unleash your inner storyteller: Roleplay in a universe you've created, where you can tell your own stories. Become a teacher, a vet, or even an influencer.
• Design your dream world: Bring your best friends to life with Character Creator. Customise hair, faces, and accessories to make up your own style! Use the intuitive Home Designer tool, and you're the architect! Decorate your own house, supermarket, campervan, or any of our constantly updated locations with the furniture and colours you love.
• Explore and discover a game of secrets and surprises: Find hundreds of hidden gems in the game! From jewels and crumpets to unlocking secret rooms, there’s always something new and exciting to uncover.
• Fresh content, always: Toca Boca World is an endless universe that keeps growing! Discover new locations and content updated every month, there's always more to explore.
• Friday is gift day! Pop into the Post Office to collect the gifts we’ve sent you on the conveyor belt, including decorations, furniture, and even pets! Keep an eye out for Gift Bonanzas where we give away a LOT of items from previous years.

More than 60 million girls and boys play on Toca Boca World, the very first game of its kind – that's a LOT of kid-testers making sure the fun never ends!
• Press play! Download Toca Boca World now and dive into an endlessly fun universe. Furnish your first apartment in Bop City, buy housewarming items for your Free Family House and don’t forget to get your hair done before the party with characters you’ve created!
• Expand your world: You can build a bigger Toca Boca World with all the stuff available in the in-app shop! Play your best influencer life in the Megastar Mansion, take care of animals in the pet hospital, or just relax in Bubble Bop Spa with your friends!
• A safe and secure play environment: At Toca Boca, we believe in the power of play above all else. Toca Boca World is a single-player kids’ game, COPPA compliant, and designed as a secure platform where you can explore, create, and play freely without interruptions. That’s our promise to you!
• Award-winning fun: Recognised as App of the Year 2021 and an Editor's Choice, Toca Boca World is praised for its quality and dedication to kids’ safety, and continues to evolve to be better and better!
• No ads, ever: Toca Boca World will never show third-party ads. We’ll never interrupt your game with adverts. Play always comes first!
• About us: Our fun, award-winning kids’ game can be downloaded on phones, tablets and computers for free. We also offer in-app purchases for our most dedicated fans, which allows us to build a game with a focus on quality that is completely ad-free and 100% safe. We take privacy very seriously, learn more at https://tocaboca.com/privacy.

• Stay connected! Discover our latest updates and collaborations by following us on social media:
https://www.instagram.com/tocaboca/
https://www.youtube.com/@tocaboca
https://www.tiktok.com/@tocaboca?lang=en-GB

► Better grades thanks to Knowunity: 94% of our users say so.
► “You get everything you need for school here, and the AI features are incredible. You won’t want to use any other AI app!”
► “I learn better, faster, and more easily. Thank you for creating this life-saving school app!”

WHY CHOOSE KNOWUNITY (SCHOOLGPT)? THE BEST AI FOR STUDENTS
> AI that truly understands school life
> Tailored explanations for every year group, right in the chat
> AI scanner, available 24/7, with the best answers
> Quizzes, revision notes, mock exams, or visual explanations – all created for you in the AI chat

FREE REVISION MATERIALS

STUDY YOUR WAY

HOMEWORK HELP

SHARE YOUR KNOWLEDGE

AI FEATURES FOR SCHOOL

> Knowunity SchoolGPT is perfect for ALL STUDENTS, ALL YEAR GROUPS, and ALL SUBJECTS. It’s fun and completely free.

SCHOOL. MADE SIMPLE.
Knowunity is designed with students’ needs in mind, so you’ll find everything you need for school in one app. Discover only relevant content, learn with friends, and find motivation and inspiration. The tutor and student community are always there for you, so you’ll never have to study alone again.
Find high-quality revision materials created by students, covering every part of the curriculum – with no gaps!

We’re real people, and we value your feedback. If you have questions or suggestions, please contact us at 
support-uk@knowunity.com

developer: FERNUS BILISIM HIZMETLERI EGI.DAN. ve TIC.LTD.STI.
description: ÜçDörtBeş Yayınlarına ait soru bankalarının çözümlerine ulaşabileceğiniz ücretsiz uygulama.

Accelerate language learning with a helpful companion app!
WRD is an engaging, free app that greatly accelerates language learning by improving your vocabulary quickly and easily. Master your reading, listening, speaking, and writing skills with quick, short exercises.

Instant access to the most popular topics speeds up the language learning process. High-quality audios recorded by native speakers help you speak properly. Learn to speak new languages before going to sleep or even on the go. Just listen, memorise, and refresh words in the Audio Mode.

Based on the experience of language experts, computer language models, and statistics, WRD helps you quickly advance in learning Spanish, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Lithuanian, Norwegian, Swedish, Polish, Portuguese, Ukrainian, Turkish, Belarusian, and Russian. More languages are coming soon.

Why WRD?

• WRD effectively engages you to effortlessly practise quick lessons for reliable results in reading, listening, speaking, and writing.

• WRD quickly imprints solid, long-term word associations in visual, audio, and text forms into your memory with a science-based process.

• WRD adapts to your own pace and builds a personal learning plan for your level.

• Practise dozens of useful everyday topics in addition to the primary learning course.

• Complete your goals, get rewards, and track your progress across many languages at the same time.

• Learning with WRD is free.

If you love WRD, try WRD PRO for 7 days free! Learn faster without ads, access full databases of words and topics, get advanced progress analysis, and learn multiple languages.

Upon confirmation of the WRD PRO purchase, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and it will be charged for renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period. Automatic renewal can be turned off at any time in your Account Settings after purchase. After the cancellation of the renewal, WRD PRO will expire at the end of the current period.

For support and feedback, contact us at:
info@wrd.app

Privacy Policy: https://wrd.app/privacy.html
Terms of Service: https://wrd.app/terms.html

Anadolu Üniversitesi Resmi Mobil uygulaması Anadolu Mobil, artık hem iPhone'da, hem iPad'te! 

Açıköğretim Fakültesi'nden aldığınız derslerin tüm materyallerini cebinizde taşıyın. Sınav giriş bilgilerinizi ve sınavda sorumlu olduğunuz üniteleri takip edin. 

Yeni sürümle birlikte daha etkili bir kullanıcı deneyimi sunan yeni arayüzle sınav notlarınızı, sosyal medya paylaşımlarımızı, Radyo A'yı, Taşbina, Akademik Kulüp ve yemekhane menülerini, üniversite akademik takvim, etkinler ve duyurularını, personel için portal bilgilerini, kampüs haritasını bir araya getirdik ve cebinize sığdırdık.

NOT: Yeni kayıt olan öğrencilerimizin dersler bölümünü aktif olarak kullanabilmeleri için ders bilgilerinin sisteme yüklenmesini beklemeleri gerekmektedir. 

Yapıcı yorumlarınızı dikkate alıyoruz.

İstek, öneri ve şikayetlerinizi AÖS Destek menüsünden iletebilirsiniz. Ayrıca web üzerinden aosdestek.anadolu.edu.tr adresinden de iletebilirsiniz.

BİZ, Türkiye Cumhuriyeti Gençlik ve Spor Bakanlığı'nın desteğiyle, gençlerin kişisel, sosyal ve eğitimsel gelişimlerine katkı sağlamak amacıyla yenilikçi bir mobil uygulama olarak tasarlandı. Yurt işlemlerinden sosyal etkinliklere, spor faaliyetlerinden sanat ve kültür etkinliklerine kadar gençlerin her alandaki gelişimini desteklemek üzere baştan sona yenilendi.
Yenilenen puan sistemi, öğrencilere geniş bir fırsat ve avantaj yelpazesi sunarak, onların gelişimine katkıda bulunuyor. Ayrıca, geliştirilmiş bildirim sistemimiz sayesinde öğrenciler, sunulan avantajlardan ve fırsatlardan anında haberdar olabilecekler.
BİZ ile gençler, hayatlarını zenginleştirecek aktiviteleri keşfederken, aynı zamanda kariyer ve kişisel gelişim yollarında ilerleyebilecekler            GSBBiz projesi sayesinde ‘Etkinlik Okuma’ özelliği sayesinde eğitmen öğrenci arasındaki etkinlik/eğitim/antrenman yoklama işlemlerinin mekan-cihaz fark etmeksizin basit bir QR okuma işlemi ile gerçekleştirebilir olmasıdır.
GSBBiz projesi üzerinden kullanıcılar bildirimler sayesinde haber ve duyurulardan anlık olarak erişim sağlayabileceklerdir.

Welcome to Keiki World — the ultimate learning app for toddlers and kids aged 2-6+ that transforms playtime into powerful early learning experiences. Keiki World is 100% ad-free, kidSAFE Certified, and a Mom’s Choice Award winner.
Approved by early-learning experts, Keiki World meets the specific developmental needs of toddlers and preschoolers — helping parents raise future-ready learners who master preschool basics while also developing creativity, problem-solving skills, and the confidence to figure things out.
Flash cards, colorful worksheets, toddler games, interactive cartoons, and more essential activities for your little one. Trusted by families in more than 170 countries, Keiki 

World offers over 1,500 interactive activities and 500+ printables, developing vital skills, including:
- ABC tracing & spelling
- Speech & Communication
- Counting ability 
- Color & shape recognition 
- Hand-eye coordination 
- Fine motor skills 
- Logical thinking 
- Problem solving 
- Creativity 
- Self-confidence and cooperation
- Attentiveness & alertness
Keiki World is 100% ad-free, kidSAFE Certified, and a Mom’s Choice Award winner.

Keiki World Approach
Daily consistent learning – Short, interactive sessions fit naturally into everyday family life, building steady progress and curiosity.
Future-ready skills – Every game nurtures early academics, creativity, critical thinking, communication, and emotional intelligence to prepare kids for school and for life
Screen-free practice – More than 500 printables, worksheets, and hands-on activities extend learning into real-world family moments.

Expert-Crafted
Expert-designed curriculum – Developed by educators and child-development specialists to support each stage of growth and confidence.

Keiki World Interactive Activities
Make your kid’s screen time fun and meaningful with games and activities like:
- ABC Puzzles – Train letter recognition & phonics with drag-and-drop puzzles.
- Trace Letters – Practice writing in a cosmic interface that builds focus and fine-motor skills.
- Memory Cards – Find pairs and boost memory on topics from ABC to animals and colors.
- Jigsaw Puzzles – Assemble images to learn shapes, imagination, and logical thinking.
- Fill the Gaps – Match objects by shape and color to strengthen attention and logic.
- Funny Kids Songs – Learn letters, numbers, animals, and phonics through music.
Plus: Educational Cartoons, Sorting, Cooking — and even more!

Worksheets & Offline Learning
Over 500 printables and skill-based worksheets, organized by topic, provide more than 400 hours of purposeful learning. They include: Writing, Speech & Language, Math, Logic, Creativity, Dinosaurs, and Useful Tips for Parents. Each one is designed to nurture curiosity, independence, and a lifelong love of learning.
Your child can learn colors, numbers, letters, animals, drawing, and much more — all in one app!

Subscription Details
- Once the free Keiki World trial period is over, users are automatically charged the price specified in the app.
- Auto-renewal option can be managed in your iTunes Account Settings. You can cancel your subscription at any time, but please do so at least 24 hours before the end date of the current period.
- Your ideas, opinions, and suggestions are welcome at support@keiki.app. Feel free to contact us if you need help with any app-related
Privacy Policy: https://bit.ly/3EV70Xw
Terms of Use: https://bit.ly/3ibVRrJ

Sincerely yours, Keiki Team
